attributes.action: Debate and vote on a motion of no confidence in the current government
attributes.additional_details: It is vital for UK citizens to now make an informed decision on the direction the country will take post the result of the EU Referendum.
attributes.background: The current elected Conservative government has no public mandate to shape or direct of future of the United Kingdom outside of the European Union. Therefore I am calling on Parliament to vote on a motion of no-confidence in the current government and trigger a General Election.
